properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide with me Fast falls the eventide The darkness deepens Lord with me abide When other helpers Fail and comforts flee Help of the helpless Oh abide with me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Swift to its close Ebbs out life's little day Earth's joys grow dim Its glories pass away Change and decay In all around I see O Thou who changest not Abide with me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come not in terrors As the King of kings But kind and good With healing in Thy wings Tears for all woes A heart for every plea Come Friend of sinners Thus abide with me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need Thy presence Every passing hour What but Thy grace Can foil the tempter's power Who like Thyself My guide and stay can be Through cloud and sunshine Oh abide with me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I fear no foe With Thee at hand to bless Ills have no weight And tears no bitterness Where is death's sting Where grave thy victory I triumph still If Thou abide with me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Reveal Thyself Before my closing eyes Shine through the gloom And point me to the skies Heaven's morning breaks And earth's vain shadows flee In life - In death O Lord abide with me{/lang-eng}
